game.name: Chess Royal
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A simple yet satisfying game of chess that anyone can play - and learn from. Challenge a powerful chess AI, play against your friends, and try to get through a massive tower of puzzles!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A simple yet satisfying game of chess that anyone can play - and learn from. Challenge a powerful chess AI, play against your friends, and try to get through a massive tower of puzzles!
